Text:
Thanks for this great film.English subtitles are hard subbed.
A 9/10
V 7.5/10

Has a watermark at the top, though not obstructing the picture.  Permanently letterboxed.

A: 9/10
V: 7/10

Oh, was that a watermark? I thought - in my stupid head -  that it was a fucking BANNER! You can rip better than this blahavink.

Here's a snapshot pic with that "watermark":

http://s15.postimage.org/nuwjuw1pl/vlcsnap_2012_07_04_00h34m37s193.png

The english textfile is burnt in, with some crazy big science fiction inspired font...

Yes, that is the actual aspect ratio the images are ripped in, 720x576. It should have - at best - look liked this:

http://s17.postimage.org/d3bw5yxd9/vlcsnap_2012_07_04_00h34m37s193.png

But, dear folks; the amazing VLC saves the day :-). You only have to crop the images while playing the movie. For me, 1.85:1 gave the best result.
